task.title: How to Change the Calendar View
task.shortdesc: Here are the instructions on how to change the calendar view in the calendar application.

prereq.p: To successfully change the calendar view, you must know what different calendar views mean.

step.cmd: In the Google Calendar app, click the View Selector button in the top-right corner.
Click the view you want (e.g., day, week, month) from the drop-down menu.
The calendar will refresh to display the selected view.

result.p: The calendar will display the selected view.
